subject:
[cc-community] Do you know about case study on why it is better to
 use CC instead of full Copyright?
body:
Hey folks, 
Do someone know a review or case study on why it is better to use CC instead of Copyright for
scientific material or presentation on how to exchange knowledge within a company?

I need it for a project to provide training materials for the managers of companies from the industry which generate usually exclusively copyrighted knowledge, and I want to say and provide examples that sometimes CC is better and useful choice.

Thanks in advance!

Regards,
Dessi Pefeva
CC Bulgaria
